files.description: Define/extend the project JSON Schema for artifacts with a dedicated case_study artifact definition and required fields used by the add_case_study CLI.
Provide Python helpers to load and minimally validate case-study metadata against METADATA_SCHEMA.json (including user-friendly error reporting).
Implement ARTIFACT_INDEX read/update utilities to add a new case-study entry idempotently while preserving existing index content and ordering.
Generate the case-study YAML/JSON metadata file and Markdown stub content under outputs/case_studies/ using a consistent naming convention and front-matter if needed.
Implement the add_case_study command-line tool that prompts/accepts args, writes new case-study metadata + markdown stub into outputs/case_studies/, and updates ARTIFACT_INDEX.
Document the add_case_study CLI usage, expected fields, output file layout, and how it updates ARTIFACT_INDEX.
